testcaseName: Child under 9 needs two in first season
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child under the age of 9 receives dose 1 of the influenza vaccine in his first season, that a second dose is recommended at 4 weeks later.
reasonForChange:
V4.4: Rolled test cases forward from 2019-2020 season to 2020-2021 season. Updated Administered vaccine to quadrivalent as trivalent will eventually phase out.
V4.1: Rolled test cases forward from 2018-19 season to 2019-2020 season.
V3.5: Rolled test cases forward from 2017-18 season to 2018-19 season.
